eu_initiatives: We have interest in EU activities concerning use of the term "organic", public procurement, textiles and apparel.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

goals__remit: We develop, continually revise and operate the "Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)". GOTS is the international voluntary textile processing standard based on the use of organic raw material and comprising ecological and social criteria. It covers the whole supply chain and provides for indepent third party certification, based on regular inspections and tests.
